TL;DR: I am here to make sure our team i: TL;DR: I am here to make sure our team is successful, happy, and working on the things that are most important to help our customers and improve our product.
Kind of modern traveler, working as a no: Kind of modern traveler, working as a nomad worker and living with bare minimum. Fall in love of Transparency. It's about building trust with our people while giving them better data to make better decisions along the way.
Typically, I start my mornings around 6: Typically, I start my mornings around 6 am and I wake up my parents (one of the co-founders) to let me out. Then it's nap on the couch, play with my ball and watch my master work.
We want to become a game changing compan: We want to become a game changing company on marketing and broad communication. Our purpose is the pain to people who are struggling with more and more social networks every day like Facebook, Linkedin, Medium, RSS, Twitter, Instagram, Slack, Mailchimp, ...
RunAs is a platform of smart marketing -: RunAs is a platform of smart marketing - we help your team to automate smartly all your media in one place From and To any social networks.
Our Smart Automation platform helps in c: Our Smart Automation platform helps in content curation, scheduling, social listening, backup, recommendation and analytics. It works with Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Shopify, Slack, Medium and many more.
Curating articles and images for your so: Curating articles and images for your social accounts has never been so easy. Take away the headache of crafting separate posts for each individual social profile and automatically customize your posts for all your profiles.
Keep on top of your social media game wi: Keep on top of your social media game with easy scheduling and publishing to all your social media accounts. Compose your own posts and schedule them to go out later.
You can use the analytics to see your so: You can use the analytics to see your social media performance, understand how to improve your results, and create reports for your manager or clients. Track, analyse and download your social reports.
Track every mention, comment and reply i: Track every mention, comment and reply in your inbox. Automatically find and recommend articles and images your audience will love, so you can share them to all your social profile and keep your timelines
Our RunAs MVP platform will be live in Q: Our RunAs MVP platform will be live in Q2 2019 with Twitter, Linkedin and Facebook accounts.
